com.github.deltaspikedbunit.assertion

Interface DatabaseAssertion


  • public interface DatabaseAssertion
    Database assertion strategy interface.
    Author:
    Luigi Bitonti, Mario Zagar, Sunitha Rajarathnam

      Asserts that the specified dataSets are conceptually equal.

    • Method Detail

      • assertEquals

        void assertEquals(org.dbunit.dataset.IDataSet expectedDataSet,
                org.dbunit.dataset.IDataSet actualDataSet)
                  throws org.dbunit.DatabaseUnitException
        Asserts that the specified dataSets are conceptually equal.
        Parameters:
        expectedDataSet - the expected dataset
        actualDataSet - the actual dataset
        Throws:
        org.dbunit.DatabaseUnitException - if the datasets are not equal

      • assertEquals

        void assertEquals(org.dbunit.dataset.ITable expectedTable,
                org.dbunit.dataset.ITable actualTable)
                  throws org.dbunit.DatabaseUnitException
        Asserts that the specified dataSets are conceptually equal.
        Parameters:
        expectedTable - the expected table
        actualTable - the actual table
        Throws:
        org.dbunit.DatabaseUnitException - if the tables are not equal
